page.title: 04ESTATE HOUSING IN CHIPPENHAM
page.content: To the North East of Chippenham lies {Monkton Park Housing Estate.}It is a quiet estate about half a mile from the town centre.Most people who live here have their own transport.The Southern side of the estate is bordered by the {River Avon. The estate was built in 1972,there are {800 houses}in 32 roads.There is a parade of shops and a {primary school. The estate gets its name from a local park.There is a Par 3 golf course and an outdoor heated swimming pool. The bungalows and houses are very similar and visitors can easily get lost. There is only one road from the estate into Chippenham and because of this the estate has been called the { {largest cul-de-sac}in Europe.
